kpi_info.title: Node Level Average CPU Load
kpi_info.use: The average CPU usage at node level in percent (within 0 and 100 with values rounded to the next integer) during the reporting period between time T1 (beginning of the reporting period) and T2 (end of the reporting period). This is calculated using the formula: 100 - 100 * delta(cumulative number of CPU idle seconds)/delta(cumulative elapsed time), where delta(X) = X(T2) - X(T1). UPDATED: This counter is updated when the CPU-usage is increased or decreased. The data is updated on a per-RU level.
